pages.text: $(li)The Badlands is a biome composed mosly of Red Sand and Terracota that can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Even being a desert place without much life, you can find some vegetation, like Cactus, Dead Bushes and rarely, dirt areas with Yucca, Spruce, Oak and Dark Oak trees.

$(li)There are even animals that can withstand these harsh conditions, like Roadrunners, Emus, Sunbirds, Kangaroos and Rattlesnakes$(br)$(li)And of course,find dangerous creatures like Hushes can be found in this biome too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Badlands$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
